mapper.select: select sum(tt.sales) sales, (to_date(to_char(tt.order_date,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') - to_date('19700101','yyyymmdd')) * (1*24*60*60*1000) as order_date from (select DECODE(mentor_badge,1,mb.meetingboard_price*0.05,mb.meetingboard_price*0.1) sales, mm.member_name member_name, mo.order_date order_date from meeting_order mo, meetingboard mb, mentor mt, mentors_member mm where order_flag = 1 and mo.meetingboard_seq = mb.meetingboard_seq and mb.mentor_email = mt.mentor_email and mb.mentor_email = mm.member_email)tt group by (to_date(to_char(tt.order_date,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') - to_date('19700101','yyyymmdd')) * (1*24*60*60*1000) order by order_date

select sum(tt.sales) sales,to_char(tt.order_date,'yy/mm') order_date from (select DECODE(mentor_badge,1,mb.meetingboard_price*0.05,mb.meetingboard_price*0.1) sales, mm.member_name member_name, mo.order_date order_date from meeting_order mo, meetingboard mb, mentor mt, mentors_member mm where order_flag = 1 and mo.meetingboard_seq = mb.meetingboard_seq and mb.mentor_email = mt.mentor_email and mb.mentor_email = mm.member_email)tt group by to_char(tt.order_date,'yy/mm')

select sum(tt.sales) sales, tt.member_name member_name from (select mo.meetingboard_seq meetingboard_seq, mb.meetingboard_price sales, mm.member_name member_name, mm.member_profile member_profile from meeting_order mo, meetingboard mb, mentors_member mm where order_flag = 1 and mo.meetingboard_seq = mb.meetingboard_seq and mb.mentor_email = mm.member_email)tt group by tt.member_name

select * from (select rownum rn, aa.* from (select sum(tt.sales) sales, tt.member_name, tt.member_profile, tt.mentor_badge, tt.mentor_email from (select mo.meetingboard_seq meetingboard_seq, mb.meetingboard_price sales, mm.member_name member_name, mm.member_profile member_profile, mt.mentor_badge mentor_badge, mt.mentor_email mentor_email from meeting_order mo, meetingboard mb, mentor mt, mentors_member mm where order_flag = 1 and mo.meetingboard_seq = mb.meetingboard_seq and mb.mentor_email = mt.mentor_email and mb.mentor_email = mm.member_email)tt group by (tt.member_name,tt.member_profile,tt.mentor_badge,tt.mentor_email) order by sales desc)aa) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}

select count(*) cnt from (select sum(tt.sales) sales, tt.member_name, tt.member_profile, tt.mentor_badge, tt.mentor_email from (select mo.meetingboard_seq meetingboard_seq, mb.meetingboard_price sales, mm.member_name member_name, mm.member_profile member_profile, mt.mentor_badge mentor_badge, mt.mentor_email mentor_email from meeting_order mo, meetingboard mb, mentor mt, mentors_member mm where order_flag = 1 and mo.meetingboard_seq = mb.meetingboard_seq and mb.mentor_email = mt.mentor_email and mb.mentor_email = mm.member_email)tt group by (tt.member_name,tt.member_profile,tt.mentor_badge,tt.mentor_email) order by sales desc)
